sentences.english: The man wore a bathrobe and had evidently just come from the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 那人穿了一件浴衣，显然是刚从浴室出来。

sentences.english: Funny ladybug animal ($56.99) towel in bright red.
Here. Put this bathing suit on.
Imagine the audience in bathrobes in case you are nervous.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感到紧张，不妨想象听众都穿着浴衣之样子。

sentences.english: She bought a new bathrobe yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 她昨天买了一件新浴衣。

sentences.english: He came out the bathroom, wearing the red silk bathrobe.
sentences.chinese: 他从浴室出来，穿着那件红色的丝质浴衣。

sentences.english: Without bothering to dry off, I pulled on my bathrobe.
sentences.chinese: 还没来得及擦干身子，我就穿上了浴衣。

sentences.english: Also wearing a bathrobe, in view photos, that is what the boys do?
sentences.chinese: 也穿着浴衣，在查看照片，那是怎样的男孩呢？

sentences.english: Start with an oversized, 100 percent cotton bath sheet for maximum blotting.
sentences.chinese: 从大号的100%棉的浴衣开始，到最大的吸水纸。

sentences.english: Quickly he turned off the tap, slipped on his dressing-gown, and hurried downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速把水龙头关上，披上浴衣，匆忙下楼。

sentences.english: I climb into bed still wearing hisbathrobe.
sentences.chinese: 我穿着他的浴衣爬上床。

sentences.english: I remember undressing, putting on a bathrobe, and standing out on the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我脱掉衣服，穿上浴衣，站在室外阳台上。

sentences.english: Put on a Tanzen (outer robe) over the Yukata , when you feel cold.
sentences.chinese: 冷的时候从浴衣上面穿上宽袖棉袍。

definition: kimono/Japanese: traditional national clothing, as opposed to Western clothing 洋服
